name: 2048 Deusia Story
description:
Game I published in the middle of 2017  in the GooglePlay Store. It is a version of the classic 2048 for which I create a story that was discovered while advancing in the game.

I had a lot of fun creating the story and the characters that would appear. For the illustrations, use illustrations created by Rexard.

To play you can slide or use the keyboard keypad by moving up, down, left or right.
